short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension wallet for accessing Entropy Network

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Entropy Wallet is a Web 3.0 wallet providing the most secure way to access various blockchain services.


Use Entropy Wallet to:

Manage your digital assets and experience 100% true ownership of your assets.

Send transactions without paying expensive gas fees (in Entropy Mainnet)

See owned Coins and NFTs & Transfer Coins and NFTs

Display recent transactions

Go directly to the successful/failed transaction in the Entropy Sacn

Connect to DApps and sign human-readable transactions from trusted DApps

Here is a more detailed our homepage:
https://entropynetwork.io/
